1)       Yes, you can still buy it, although the site we were hosted on
started having problems recently.  You're correct, though, in that it hasn't
been updated for a number of years now, although some nifty people at
SnowStorm made a new Win32 port of the game.  The original is still being
sold through Albert's Ambry
(http://www.alberts.com:8080/Ambry/Search?Type=KeyWord
<http://www.alberts.com:8080/Ambry/Search?Type=KeyWord&StartAfter=&maxHits=1
0&AndOr=all&OS=&SearchText=gladiator>
&StartAfter=&maxHits=10&AndOr=all&OS=&SearchText=gladiator).

2)       G:BF pretty much got abandoned when the four main programmers had
to get real jobs and stop working on Gladiator all the time :-(  ... it's
kind of a pipe dream to get back together and work on it, but so far
Blizzard has kept us too busy.

 

--Tom

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Amir Touray [mailto:z0diac717@...] 
Sent: Thursday, March 06, 2003 8:46 PM
To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] New Poster: On Buying Gladiator

 

1)Can I still buy Glad?
The site hasn't been updated in years and I don't want
to send money to a collapsed company, no matter how
good the Glad demo was.

2)Is Glad: BF coming up ever? or is that just a dream?
